de.tr7zw.changeme.nbtapi

Class NBTTileEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tr7zw.changeme.nbtapi.NBTCompound
      • de.tr7zw.changeme.nbtapi.NBTTileEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReadableNBT, ReadWriteNBT

    public class NBTTileEntity
extends NBTCompound
    NBT class to access vanilla tags from TileEntities. TileEntities don't support custom tags. Use the NBTInjector for custom tags. Changes will be instantly applied to the Tile, use the merge method to do many things at once.
    Author:
    tr7zw
